description:
Alina and Silver Sword go undercover to find the source of the rumor about relics that grant Dia skills.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Hakugin no Back Attacker Desu ga, Dema Yarou o Tottsukamaeyou to Omoimasu
I May Be Silver Sword`s Back Attacker, but I`m Gonna Catch the Jerk Who Started That Rumor
白銀の後衛役[バックアタッカー]ですが, デマ野郎を取っ捕まえようと思います
